entry.def: A protractor is a flat, semi-circular piece of plastic or metal which is used for measuring angles.

means.word_mean: 1. drafting instrument used to draw or measure angles

auth_sentence.content: Since no one in my office has a protractor, does anyone have any tips on how I can check that I'm sitting at the correct angle?
